usage.level0: Flat elements, cards flush with background, disabled states
usage.level1: Subtle elevation for cards, inputs, default interactive elements
usage.level2: Raised cards, dropdowns, hover states, selected items
usage.level3: Floating panels, popovers, sticky headers, tooltips
usage.level4: Modals, dialogs, overlays, maximum elevation for critical UI

notes.darkMode: Dark mode shadows use higher opacity (30-60%) for better visibility against dark backgrounds
notes.transitions: All shadow changes should use 200ms cubic-bezier easing for smooth, professional feel
notes.layering: Higher levels indicate content closer to user; use sparingly to maintain hierarchy
